data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Yucheng, Ballarin, Francesco, Li, Shuqiang (2016): A survey of the spider family Nesticidae (Arachnida, Araneae) in Asia and Madagascar, with the description of forty-three new species. ZooKeys 627: 1-168, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.627.8629, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.627.8629
